orcidbio: Jinning Wang received B.S. and M.S. degrees in electrical engineering from Taiyuan University of Technology, Taiyuan, China, in 2017 and 2020, respectively. He is currently pursuing a Ph.D. degree in electrical engineering at the University of Tennessee, Knoxville, TN, USA. His research interests include demand response for frequency regulation, renewable integration, and power system control.
